    cp_fclass : coverpoint unsigned'(ins.current.rd_val)  iff (ins.trap == 0 )  {
        // "ensuring each possible bit can be changed";
        bins bit_0_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000000000001};
        bins bit_1_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000000000010};
        bins bit_2_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000000000100};
        bins bit_3_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000000001000};
        bins bit_4_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000000010000};
        bins bit_5_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000000100000};
        bins bit_6_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000001000000};
        bins bit_7_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000010000000};
        bins bit_8_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000000100000000};
        bins bit_9_1  = {32'b00000000000000000000001000000000};
    }
